_source.text: A deluge a few hours before kick-off left the San Siro pitch resembling a bog, but Meazza, who knew this ground better than anybody on the Italian team, made light of the conditions to book his country's place in the final.

text: A **deluge** a few hours before **kick**-off left the San Siro pitch resembling a bog, but Meazza, who knew
this ground **better** **than** anybody on the Italian team, made light of the conditions to book his country's place in the final.
